review: I have never owned any other Roku products, so I can't compare the stick to the box.  I bought this for snowbird living (2 month vacations).I have used the stick every day for the past 10 days.  Compared to my 3 year old Vizio smart tv, this stick is faster at loading.  So I would not complain about the speed.  I had my Kindle Fire HDX handy for setup, and felt like setup was easy.I have had to reset the stick by powering down a few times, but have had mostly trouble free streaming.  If I could give partial stars, I would give this product 4.5 stars.  It may not be perfect, but I feel like I got my monies' worth.
author: LeeZ06
